name: deepwiki-generator
description: Generate comprehensive DeepWiki documentation using autonomous AI agents.

languageModelTools.name: deepwiki-generator_createDeepWiki
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Analyzes the current workspace and generates comprehensive DeepWiki documentation using autonomous sub-agents. It orchestrates a Surveyor, Analyst, and Writer agent to plan, analyze, and document the codebase.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Generate DeepWiki documentation for the current workspace.

outputPath.description: Optional output directory path for the generated DeepWiki. Defaults to '.deepwiki' in workspace root.

includePrivate.description: Whether to include private/internal APIs in documentation. Defaults to false.

maxDepth.description: Maximum depth for analyzing nested modules/packages. Defaults to 5.
